modName: Magicka regen config and enchanting fix
summary: Sets base magicka regeneration rates based on the 25 magicka reduction perks.  Allows custom PC only in-combat magicka regeneration rates.  Fix for broken enchantment magicka reduction.  Requires Script Dragon
descriptionHtml:
This mod requires Script Dragon.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8221
or
http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?altname=skyrim_script_dragon

This plugin allows you to modify your magicka regeneration rates based on the magicka cost reduction perks found in each of the 5 magic trees.  

There are 6 configurable values:
base regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 3% per second
novice perk regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 0%
apprentice perk regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 0%
adept perk regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 0%
expert perk regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 0%
master perk regeneration - Default Skyrim value of 0%

A configuration value to modify just the pc\'s in combat magicka regeneration rate.

A configuration value to fix the magic skill enchantments.  This fixes enchanted item effects such that they properly scale indefinitely without becoming game breaking

For example, say you have 4 items that reduce destruction spells by 25%
Vanilla skyrim will reduce the cost by 25% + 25% + 25% + 25% = 100%  Ie. everything is free!

This uses the formula: 1 - (0.99 ^ (DestructionPercent * 0.85)) where the 0.85 value is configurable
Instead of fixed percentages, think of them as points to reduce cost
So say you have 1 ring for 25 points
the result percent reduction would be 1 - 0.99 ^ (25 * 0.85) = 19.23% reduction or 80.77% of the original cost
Now say you wear an amulet also worth 25 points
the final percent reduction would be 1 - 0.99 ^ (50 * 0.85) = 34.7% reduction or 65.3% of the original cost
Notice that 65.33 is 80.77% of 80.77%. So each 25 points reduces the cost by an additional 80.77%

This only applies to enchantments that modify destruction, conjuration, alteration, illusion, and restoration spell costs.

Everything is better explained in the ini file.

All files go in data\\asi\\

Bugs:
The disease that drops your magicka regeneration in half actually reduces your base magicka regeneration by 1.5%, so if you have less than that, you will have 0 magicka regen until the disease is cured.
